titles.title: Commending the Northport American Legion Post 694 located in Northport, New York, for raising funds for the Marine and Army combat units fighting in the Middle East, enabling them to purchase needed equipment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Commends: (1) Northport American Legion Post 694 in Northport, New York, for raising more than $75,000 to purchase needed equipment for Marine and Army units fighting in the Middle East; and (2) other American Legion Posts nationwide that have raised funds for similar purposes.
